src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (petak): PSŽ kao TŽV tutnji kroz Dižon, Hofenhajm nastavlja pobednički niz
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 1. novembar...

01 Nov 2019


NAPOMENA: 
U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.


Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?


Ostavite svoj komentar ispod teksta...

Fiksevi dana
ENGLESKA 2 ID: 4489925
20:45 | Barnsli - Bristol Siti
Od trijumfa nad Fulamom u 1. kolu Barnsli je osvojio još pet bodova, sve putem remija, i s razlogom zadužio "fenjer". Bristol Siti je blizu vrha i nastojaće da mu se dodatno primakne, ali ako vas brinu njegovi nešto slabiji rezultati na strani umesto dvojke odigrajte X2&2+.
Mozzart kombinazzije: X2&2+Kvota: 1.7Fiksevi dana
NEMAČKA 1 ID: 4489928
20:30 | Hofenhajm - Paderborn
Hofenhajm je traljavo započeo sezonu, ali je iznenađujuća pobeda nad Bajernom u Minhenu sve preokrenula i bila je prva u nizu od četiri trijumfa, računajući i Kup duel u Duizburgu. I Paderborn se donekle popravio, ali na gostovanjima je bezopasan i kec ne bi smeo da izostane.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.45Fiksevi dana
FRANCUSKA 1 ID: 4489927
20:45 | Dižon - PSŽ
Poznata vam je teorija da je duele poslednjeg i prvog na tabeli najbolje preskakati jer iznenađenja nisu retka? U ovom slučaju ona "ne pije vodu" pošto je Pari Sen Žermen u naletu i ni sada neće imati pardona prema Dižonu, dvojka stiže uz 3+. Naša preporuka je kombinacija.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 2&3+Kvota: 1.52Fiksevi dana
TURSKA 1 ID: 4488584
18:30 | Galatasaraj - Rize
 
Fatih Terim je najtrofejniji trener u istoriji Galatasaraja, međutim, kredit mu je sve manji i eventualni treći uzastopni poraz uvalio bi ga u ozbiljne nevolje. Srećom po Imperatora Rize je osrednji protivnik i kec je izvestan, s tim da vam je najpametnije da preskočite golove.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.5Vredi probati
NEMAČKA 2 ID: 4489926
18:30 | Hanover - Sandhauzen
 
Hanover je lani igrao u Bundesligi, a sada je jedini uz Bohum koji nema trijumf na svom "bunjištu". Ni Sandhauzen ne blista - forma mu je još lošija i Crveni imaju priliku da konačno obraduju navijače. Mi se opredeljujemo za keca, mada ne biste pogrešili ni sa malo golova.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2Vredi probati
NEMAČKA 2 ID: 4489922
18:30 | Jan Regenzburg - Osnabrik
Tradicija ne ide na ruku Jan Regenzburgu. Međutim, bavarski drugoligaš je sve sigurniji, dok Osnabrik posle početnog entuzijazma zbog ulaska iz nižeg ranga hronično posustaje, a u poslednja dva meseca postigao je jedan jedini gol. Nije ih se ni naprimao, pa biramo keca i 0-2.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.25Vredi probati
RUMUNIJA 1 ID: 4489931
19:30 | Vitorul - Kindija
Kindijine vezane pobede na gostovanjima Botošaniju i Voluntariju verovatno zabrinjavaju vlasnika i trenera Vitorula Georgea Hađija, ali ne previše - ipak je njegov klub najbolji domaćin u Ligi 1 i pobedom bi se vratio na vrh tabele. Kec je zagarantovan, naš izbor je KMB 1&3+.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 1&3+Kvota: 2.05Za izbegavanje
VELS 1 ID: 4489695
21:00 | Konas Kvej - TNS
U pitanju je okršaj drugog i trećeg na tabeli i jasno je da ovde nijedan ishod ne bi trebalo da predstavlja iznenađenje. Domaći su bez poraza od kraja aprila, kada su izgubili upravo od ovog rivala, no skloni su remijima. Gosti su vezali tri pobede, ali sumnjamo u dvojku.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TIPPING (Friday): PSG as TZV rumble through Dijon, Hoffenheim continues winning streak
Read some suggestions for November 1st ...

01 Nov 2019


NOTE:
In the PROPOSALS and TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their opinion on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.


What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?


Leave your comment below ...

Fixes of the day
ENGLISH 2 ID: 4489925
20:45 | Barnsley - Bristol City
From the triumph over Fulham in Round 1, Barnsley scored five more points, all through draws, and rightfully borrowed the lantern. Bristol City is near the top and will try to get even closer, but if you are worried about its slightly weaker results on the side instead of two, play X2 & 2 +.
Mozzart Combo: X2 & 2 + Odds: 1.7Fixes of the day
GERMANY 1 ID: 4489928
20:30 | Hoffenheim - Paderborn
Hoffenheim started the season offensively, but a surprising victory over Bayern Munich turned everything around and was the first in a series of four triumphs, counting the Cup duel in Duisburg. Paderborn has improved to some extent, but he is harmless in away games and the ace should not be missing.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.45Fixed Days
FRANCE 1 ID: 4489927
20:45 | Dijon - PSG
You know the theory that the duels of last and first on the table are best to skip because surprises are not rare? In this case, she "does not drink water" since Paris Saint-Germain is in a rush and will not have a pardon to Dijon even now, the two arrive at 3+. Our recommendation is a combination.
Mozzart Combinations: 2 & 3 + Odds: 1.52Pixels of the Day
TURKEY 1 ID: 4488584
18:30 | Galatasaray - Rize

Fatih Terim is the most trophy coach in Galatasaray's history, however, his credit is diminishing and a possible third consecutive defeat would put him in serious trouble. Fortunately for Emperor Rize, he is a mediocre opponent and an ace is certain, but it is best for you to skip goals.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.5Worth to try
GERMANY 2 ID: 4489926
18:30 | Hanover - Sandhausen

Hanover played in the Bundesliga last year, and is now the only one with Bohum who has no triumph on his "bunji". Sandhausen isn't shining either - his form is even worse and the Reds have a chance to finally cheer for the fans. We opt for the ace, though you wouldn't be wrong with a few goals.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2 Worth a try
GERMANY 2 ID: 4489922
18:30 | Jan Regenzburg - Osnabrück
Tradition does not go to Jan Regenzburg. However, the Bavarian runner-up is getting safer, with Osnabrich chasing after an initial enthusiasm for entry from a lower rank, and in the last two months he has scored a single goal. He didn't even force them, so we pick ace and 0-2.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.25 Worth a try
ROMANIA 1 ID: 4489931
19:30 | Vitorul - Kindia
Kindia's tied away victories at Botosani and Voluntari away probably worries Vitorul owner and coach George Haji, but not too much - still his club is the best host in League 1 and would win back to the top of the table. Ace is guaranteed, our selection is KMB 1 & 3 +.
Mozzart Combinations: 1 & 3 + Odds: 2.05To avoid
VELS 1 ID: 4489695
21:00 | Konas Quay - TNS
It is a clash of second and third on the table and it is clear that no outcome here should come as a surprise. The locals have been unbeaten since late April, when they lost to this rival, but are prone to draws. The visitors tied for three wins, but we doubt two.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2
